TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Bud_Acton, title = Bud_Acton, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bud_Acton} }

S.FORM: Bud Acton nalecuhan i Troy, Michigan, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. Bud Acton i 1985 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 2 ku uwac atu silsil 40, namapili' tu nu Dallas Mavericks putiput putiput. tatama, nalecuhan ciniza i 1942 a mihcan1 a bulad 11 a demiad.

Bod Acton nalecohan i Troy, Michigan, nano syobay kanas-mali miondoay no Amilika NBA nisakapot, pahanhanan to kawaw ayza. Bod Acton i 1985 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 2 ko owac ato silsil 40, namapili' to no Dallas Mavericks potipot potipot. tatama, nalecohan ciniza i 1942 a mihcan1 a bolad 11 a demiad.
